attributes.action: Amend the ‘The Criminal Justice and Public Order Act of 1994’ to allow people to have outdoor raves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to appeal the government to remove sections 63, 64, 65, 66 & 67 plus amend other relevant sections of the ‘The Criminal Justice and Public Order Act of 1994’ to allow people to have outdoor raves and parties.  So allowing the intrinsic right of free people to gather and celebrate on open land.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
